comment.body:
It seems that YouTube's anti-adblock has changed. For the UI, a 5-second timer before closing has been added. I also tried referring to the link you provided, but the problem persists.

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end. As I see, it was fixed earlier.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. comment.body: @Eddy17 It seems that you enable many web browser extensions. please update filters and disable all web browser extensions except AdGuard Browser Extensions. Then, clear site data, cookies and cache of your web browser; reload the webpage.

commits.message:
Fix tving.com

To reproduce, follow the following instruction:
1. Connect to a VPN server located in South Korea or use a real one.
2. Sign up and sign in to Tving without a paid subscription.
3. Visit https://tving.com/live
4. Click one of live steamings with free label.
